description:
LoadBalancingFunction: Table containing load balancing function parameters for different cells in a radio access network.

- dateTime: Timestamp indicating when the data was recorded.
- Area_Name: Name of the geographical area where the cell is located.
- CellId: Unique identifier of the cell site.
- Id2:  Duplicate of CellId.
- Id3:  An additional identifier (appears to be constant in sample data).
- vsDataType: Type of data, specifying this as Load Balancing Function data.
- vsDataFormatVersion: Version of the data format, indicating Ericsson-specific attributes.
- LoadBalancingFunction.lbCeiling: Maximum load capacity of the cell.
- LoadBalancingFunction.lbHitRateEUtranMeasUeThreshold: Measurement threshold for triggering load balancing in LTE (E-UTRAN).
- LoadBalancingFunction.ocdMaxNoHighHitRateCells: Maximum number of cells with high hit rates considered for load balancing.
- LoadBalancingFunction.lbHitRateEUtranAddThreshold: Threshold for adding a cell to load balancing.
- LoadBalancingFunction.lbHitRateUtranMeasUeThreshold: Measurement threshold for triggering load balancing in UMTS (U-TRAN).
- LoadBalancingFunction.lbDiffCaOffset: Offset for cell capacity in load balancing calculations.
- LoadBalancingFunction.lbCauseCodeS1SourceTriggersOffload: Reason for triggering offload from the source cell via S1 interface.
- LoadBalancingFunction.lbSubCycle: Sub-cycle duration for load balancing evaluation.
- LoadBalancingFunction.lbUeEvaluationTimer: Timer for user equipment evaluation in load balancing.
- LoadBalancingFunction.lbCycle: Cycle duration for load balancing evaluation.
- LoadBalancingFunction.isUlEvalAllowedAtCaTrHo: Flag indicating if uplink evaluation is allowed during handover.
- LoadBalancingFunction.lbCauseCodeX2TargetAcceptsOffload: Reason for the target cell accepting offload via X2 interface.
- LoadBalancingFunction.lbHitRateEUtranMeasUeIntensity: Intensity of LTE measurement for load balancing.
- LoadBalancingFunction.lbEUtranOffloadBackoffTime: Backoff time after offloading in LTE.
- LoadBalancingFunction.txPwrForOverlaidCellDetect: Transmission power for overlaid cell detection.
- LoadBalancingFunction.lbCaThreshold: Cell capacity threshold for load balancing.
- LoadBalancingFunction.lbUtranOffloadBackoffTime: Backoff time after offloading in UMTS.
- LoadBalancingFunction.lbCaHysteresis: Hysteresis for cell capacity in load balancing.
- LoadBalancingFunction.targetLoadAwareLbdar: Flag indicating if load-aware load balancing is enabled.
- LoadBalancingFunction.lbMeasScalingLimit: Limit for measurement scaling in load balancing.
- LoadBalancingFunction.loadBalancingFunctionId: Unique ID of the load balancing function.
- LoadBalancingFunction.lbHitRateFilterCoeffCalm: Calm period coefficient for hit rate filter in load balancing.
- LoadBalancingFunction.coverageAwareLbdar: Flag indicating if coverage-aware load balancing is enabled.
- LoadBalancingFunction.lbCauseCodeX2SourceTriggersOffload: Reason for triggering offload from the source cell via X2 interface.
- LoadBalancingFunction.lbHitRateUtranAddThreshold: Threshold for adding a cell to load balancing from UMTS.
- LoadBalancingFunction.lbHitRateUtranRemoveThreshold: Threshold for removing a cell from load balancing in UMTS.
- LoadBalancingFunction.lbCauseCodeS1TargetAcceptsOffload: Reason for the target cell accepting offload via S1 interface.
- LoadBalancingFunction.lbHitRateEUtranRemoveThreshold: Threshold for removing a cell from load balancing in LTE.
- LoadBalancingFunction.lbThreshold: General load threshold for load balancing.
- LoadBalancingFunction.lbHitRateUtranMeasUeIntensity: Intensity of UMTS measurement for load balancing.
- LoadBalancingFunction.lbCaCapHysteresis: Hysteresis for cell capacity in load balancing.
- LoadBalancingFunction.lbRateOffsetCoefficient: Coefficient for rate offset in load balancing.
- LoadBalancingFunction.isUlEvalAllowedAtTpLbHo: Flag indicating if uplink evaluation is allowed during handover based on load balancing.
- LoadBalancingFunction.ocdMinHighHitThresh: Minimum high hit rate threshold for load balancing.
- LoadBalancingFunction.lbRateOffsetLoadThreshold: Load threshold for rate offset in load balancing.
